summary:
This mod/tweak is a simple ini edit that makes all favorited weapons show up
There is a video if the Screen shots aren\'t showing it off
descriptionHtml:
WORK IN PROGRESS THERE MAY AND ARE BUGS LOOK IN THE #IMPORTANT# SECTION FOR INFO

Currently im atempting to find a modder to help me anyone up for it tell me in the comments or message me thanks :)

#INSTALLATION#

Note i have played with this for many days and there are no gamebreaking bugs that i have found
im sorry if any harm comes to your game but make sure you have back ups

This mod/tweak is a simple ini edit that makes all favorited weapons show up. This is my first ever upload most people dont know how to do this so i figured id help. To instal go to Documents/my games/skyrim.   1. Then delete \\\"skyrim.ini\\\" HOW EVER YOU DO/SHOULD MAKE A BACK UP of the old one, and put the version from me you downloaded in this folder there done. A alternate way is editing the skyrim.ini your self to do this you would open the skyrim ini. 

2.
    [General]
   
    bDisableGearedUp=0

There Go play and have fun looking at your heavly armed dragonborn



#IMPORTANT#
YES I KNOW THIS IS THE 3RD VERSION OF THIS MOD QUIT SPAMMING THIS.

YOU MUST SHEATH A WEAPON BEFORE SWITCHING TO AN OTHER ONE.

ON RARE CASES NPCS WITH CROSSBOWS IN THERE INVENTORY WILL BE HOLDING A CROSSBOW WHILE WEILDING A SWORD.

IF YOU MADE PREVIOUS CHANGES TO YOUR INI DONT DELETE IT FOLLOW MEATHOD TWO
author: Pixalatedvortex
